name: Question answer
author: Mideal

sections.description: Question answer, ajax, bootstrap, gravatar avatar plugin with email notification. It looks like a chat. Add shortcode [mideal-faq-form] on your page to set the form question. Add shortcode [mideal-faq] on your page to implement the question list.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/question-answer-faq directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Question -> ‘Setting’ screen to configure the plugin
  4. Use shorcode [mideal-faq-form] on a page for add form.
  5. Use shorcode [mideal-faq] on a page for add list Question and answer.
sections.changelog:
1.0

First version

1.1

  • Added ability to send a copy of the letter
  • 2 avatar size
  • Added Google reCaptcha 2.0
  • Select the name of answer
  • Select avatars answer

1.1.1

Fixed vulnerability

1.2

  • Select color for button
  • Select color for answer and question background
  • Change place for page plugin settings

1.2.1

  • Fix ajax issue
  • Fix links
  • Fix translation
  • Select color of pagination.
  • Button size

short_description: Question-answer, ajax, bootstrap, gravatar avatar plugin with email notification and Google reCaptcha 2. It looks like a chat.
description: Question answer, ajax, bootstrap, gravatar avatar plugin with email notification. It looks like a chat. Add shortcode [mideal-faq-form] on your page to set the form question. Add shortcode [mideal-faq] on your page to implement the question list.

upgrade_notice.1.2.3:
• Added the ability to answer questions via ajax
  • Added the ability to edit answer via ajax

screenshots.caption: List question-answer. If you have permission you will see 3 buttons more - replay, publish, delete.
Also you can moderate a question in your admin panel.
